title: 1.12.1崩溃
author: ZhangHua000
txt_content:
在扔出药水瓶到方块或实体上时会卡死，只有强制关闭，即使从原版启动也会这样
启动器：BakaXL
Java：8.0 update144
崩溃日志：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Shall we play a game?

Time: 8/6/17 5:30 PM
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/mojang/text2speech/Narrator
        at biv.<init>(SourceFile:15)
        at biv.<clinit>(SourceFile:14)
        at biq.<init>(SourceFile:127)
        at bib.aq(SourceFile:557)
        at bib.a(SourceFile:404)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.mojang.text2speech.Narrator
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        ... 6 more


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:
        at biv.<init>(SourceFile:15)
        at biv.<clinit>(SourceFile:14)
        at biq.<init>(SourceFile:127)
        at bib.aq(SourceFile:557)

-- Initialization --
Details:
Stacktrace:
        at bib.a(SourceFile:404)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:123)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.12.1
        Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64) version 10.0
        Java Version: 1.8.0_144, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 271886952 bytes (259 MB) / 389283840 bytes (371 MB) up to 2077753344 bytes (1981 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx2048M
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        Launched Version: 1.12.1
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: GeForce GTX 750 Ti/PCIe/SSE2 GL version 4.5.0 NVIDIA 382.05, NVIDIA Corporation
        GL Caps: Using GL 1.3 multitexturing.
Using GL 1.3 texture combiners.
Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported.
Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported.
VBOs are available because OpenGL 1.5 is supported.

        Using VBOs: Yes
        Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.

        Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)

replies.author: LX神龙
replies.txt_content: 你可以参考这个帖子，希望对你有帮助，https://tieba.baidu.com/p/2736941615

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content: 尝试删除libraries文件然后重新使用启动器补全
